definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Objective In order to explore an effective method of diagnosis for trypanosomatosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的为了探索伊氏锥虫病诊断的新方法。

sentences.english: The diseasedevelopesdevelops more quickly over a few weeks or months in people infected with trypanosoma rhodesiense.
sentences.chinese: 另一种叫锥虫病则会在数周或数月内较快发作。

sentences.english: The causal organism is a different species from those causing the African form of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 致病生物与引起非洲锥虫病的生物属不同的种。

sentences.english: Chagas disease may cause a similar disorder.
sentences.chinese: 美洲锥虫病可能会导致同样的疾病。

definition: sleeping sickness/African trypanosomiasis/see also 非洲錐蟲病|非洲锥虫病[Fei1 zhou1 zhui1 chong2 bing4]

pinyin: di4 fang1 xing4 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2

definition: schistosome, parasitic flatworm causing snail fever (bilharzia or schistosomiasis)

pinyin: gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4

definition: chicken cholera (caused by Pasteurella multocida or P. avicida)/fowl cholera
